channel.title: CVE Feed for PrestaShop -- ps_linklist
channel.description: The latest CVEs for PrestaShop -- ps_linklist

item.title: CVE-2020-5273|2024-08-04T08:22:09.084Z -- prestashop -- ps_linklist
item.description: In PrestaShop module ps_linklist versions before 3.1.0, there is a stored XSS when using custom URLs. The problem is fixed in version 3.1.0

item.title: CVE-2020-5266|2024-08-04T08:22:09.107Z -- prestashop -- ps_linklist
item.description: In the ps_link module for PrestaShop before version 3.1.0, there is a stored XSS when you create or edit a link list block with the title field. The problem is fixed in 3.1.0
